sentences.en: A new type of furnaca - FLEX melter , made by Sorg Co.
sentences.cn: 开发FLEX窑炉的基本目的是为了能够建造一种替代坩埚炉的窑炉.

sentences.en: All the contestants flex their muscles in front of the judgers.
sentences.cn: 所有的参赛者都在评审面前展示他们的肌肉.

sentences.en: Are the flex connectors listed the only units you manufacturer?
sentences.cn: 所列出的弯管接头是你们所生产的唯一的装置 吗 ?

sentences.en: As she spoke, she watched the muscles in his forearm flex when he shifted gears.
sentences.cn: 她一边说一边注视着他换挡时前臂弯曲的样子.

sentences.en: During Joe's life time he will extend and flex finger joints at least 25 million times.
sentences.cn: 在乔的一生中,他要伸、屈指关节至少2,500万次.

sentences.en: He gave his biceps a flex to impress the ladies.
sentences.cn: 他收缩他的肱二头肌以吸引那些女士们的目光.

sentences.en: He slowly flexed his muscles and tried to stand.
sentences.cn: 他缓慢地活动了一下肌肉，想站起来。

sentences.en: I was required to hold out my arms and flex my pectorals.
sentences.cn: 我被要求伸展手臂，收紧胸肌。

sentences.en: International Super Flex Steel Conduit is used for electrical wiring where listed products are not required.
sentences.cn: Flex的国际超级钢Squarelock导管用于电线的地方列出的产品是不是必需的.

sentences.en: Remove caliper flex hose brackets from the frame rails.
sentences.cn: 从车架的轨道拆卸弯角器折曲软管支架.

sentences.en: Repair Kit Contains: 1 - Flex Seal Gasket Seat, 2 - Post O - Rings.
sentences.cn: 维修组件饱含: 1件 - 柔性密封衬垫阀座, 2件 - 柱O形环.

sentences.en: Side cutters are useful for cutting electrical flex to length.
sentences.cn: 切边钳适用于剪切电线.

sentences.en: Take a comfortably wide stance and flex your knees a little.
sentences.cn: 双腿适度分开站立，双膝稍稍弯曲。

sentences.en: The follow - up study now being reported is known as FLEX, for FIT - Term Extension.
sentences.cn: 该项跟踪性试验报道的名称为“FLEX” 或FIT 长期 延展性试验.

sentences.en: The Yo - Flex ? culture range offers advantages to both producers and consumers.
sentences.cn: 系列产品为生产者和消费者都带来好处.

sentences.en: We wound off a couple of yards of wire for a new lamp flex.
sentences.cn: 我们解开几码电线作为新的电灯花线.

words.tran_cn: 灵活的；柔韧的；易弯曲的
动摇不定的；弯曲的；波状的；[生物] 之字形的；不稳定的
灵活地；易曲地；柔软地；有弹性地
弯曲，弯曲状态；弯曲部分

phrases.tran_cn: 显示或炫耀（某人的）力量

trans.tran_en: A flex is an electric cable containing two or more wires that is connected to an electrical appliance

trans.tran_cn: 弯曲（关节），收缩（肌肉），显示力量
trans.tran_en: If you flex your muscles or parts of your body, you bend, move, or stretch them for a short time in order to exercise them
